verses.1: “Nangmah in paknamtui hal nading biakna tau khat, singkha sing tawh na bawl ding hi.
verses.2: A dung pi khat le alang, a vai zong pi khat le alang mah hi ding hi. A kikim sik li nei hi dinga, a sanna pi thum hi ding hi. A kite a tak tawh sakhat hi ding hi.
verses.3: Nangmah in kham citak tawh a tung le a pang kimkot le a kite na zut dinga, a kimkot ah kham tawh a geihual na bawl ding hi.
verses.4: Tua biakna tau adingin kham kual nih na bawl ding hi. A geihual nuai a kigal sai a pang tuakah tuate na bawl dinga, a puak nading zawlte a khum nading hi ding uh hi.
verses.5: Nangmah in singkha sing tawh a zawlte na bawl dinga, kham tawh tuate na zut ding hi.
verses.6: Nangmah tawh ka kituah nading mun, thuciamna tunga a om hehpihna tokhom mai, thuciamna singkuang kiangah a om dalna puan mai ah biakna tau na koih ding hi.
verses.7: Aaron in tua tungah a namtui paknamtui hal ding hi. Amah in zingsang simin meivakte a puah ciangin hal ding hi.
verses.8: Aaron in nitakin zong meivakte a koih ciangin tuate hal dinga, na khang tawntungun Topaʼ mai ah a namtui hi tawntung ding hi.
verses.9: Tua tungah a siangtho lo paknamtui hitaleh, meihal biakna hitaleh, an tawh biakna hitaleh na pia kei ding hi. Tua tungah tuibuah na sung kei ding hi.
verses.10: Aaron in kilem nadingin khialhna hanga biakna si a kite tungah kum khatin khatvei zut ding hi. Amah in na khang tawntungun kum khatin khatvei kilemna bawl ding hi. Tua pen Topaʼ tungah a siangtho pen ahi hi,” a ci hi.
verses.12: “Israel mite a phazah na sim ciangin amauʼ lakah gimna a tun loh nadingin, a milip in a kitatkhiatna uh Topaʼ tungah pia ding uh hi.
verses.13: Mi simna ah a kihel mi peuhmah in biakinn shekel tawh kituakin shekel lang (shekel khat ah gerah sawm nih om hi), Topaʼ tungah biakna-in pia ding hi.
verses.14: Mi simna ah a kihel, kum sawm nih panin a tungsiah peuhmah in Topaʼ tungah biakna pia ding hi.
verses.15: Note ading kilemna bawl nadingin Topa biakna na piak uh ciangin a haute in shekel lang sangin a tam zaw pia lo dinga, a zawngte in a tawm zaw pia lo ding hi.
verses.16: Nomau adingin kilemna bawl nading, Topaʼ mai ah Israel mite ka phawkna a hisak dingin Israel mite tung panin kilemna sum na la dinga, kikhopna buk nasep nadingin na zang ding hi,” a ci hi.
verses.18: “Kisil nadingin sumngo kuang khat le a ngak nading zong sumngo mah tawh bawl in. Nangmah in kikhopna buk le biakna tau kikalah na koih dinga, tua sungah tui na koih ding hi.
verses.19: Aaron le a tapate in a khut uh le a khe uh tua tui tawh sil ding uh hi.
verses.20: Kikhopna buk ah amaute a pai ciang uh ahi a, Topaʼ tungah mei tawh kihal biakna hal dingin biakna tau nai ah a pai ciang uh ahi zongin, amaute a sih loh nadingun amaute tui tawh kisil ding uh hi.
verses.21: A sih khak loh nadingun a khut uh le a khe uh sil ding uh hi. Tua pen na khang tawntungun amaute tunga kipanin amauʼ suanlekhakte tungah ngeina kip khat hi ding hi,” a ci hi.
verses.22: Tua tham loin, Topa in Moses kiangah,
verses.23: “A hoih pen a namtui nate la in. Myrrh paknamtui shekel za nga le a namtui thaksing tua zah lang, shekel za nih le sawm nga a gik le a khum a namtui paknamtui za nih le sawm nga,
verses.24: biakinn shekel tawh kituakin thaksing nam khat za nga le oliv thau bung khat,
verses.25: nangmah in paknamtui bawlteʼ bawl mah bangin a siangtho sathau nilh dingin hihte na gawm dinga, tua pen a siangtho sathau nilh hi ding hi.
verses.26: Nangmah in tua tawh kikhopna buk le thuciamna singkuang,
verses.27: sabuai le a nazat khempeuh, meivak khuam le a nazatte le paknamtui biakna tau,
verses.28: meihal biakna tau a nazat khempeuh tawh, kuang le a ngakna na zut ding hi.
verses.29: Tuate a siangtho pen ahih theih nadingin na siangthosak dinga, tuate a lawng peuhmah a siangtho suak ding hi.
verses.30: Amaute in keima tungah siampi na hong sep theih nadingun Aaron le a tapate nangmah in sathau nilhin amaute na siangthosak ding hi.
verses.31: Nangmah in Israel mite kiangah, ‘Hih pen na khang tawntungun a siangtho keima sathau nilh hi ding hi.
verses.32: Mi mawkmawkteʼ pumpi tungah tua sathau kisung lo dinga, tua bangin a kigawm sathau dang na bawl kei ding uh hi. Tua pen a siangtho hi a, note adingin a siangtho hi ding hi.
verses.33: Tua tawh a kibangin a bawl mi peuhmah ahi a, a pualam mi khatpeuh tuate a nilhsak mi peuhmah ahi zongin ama miteʼ kiang panin kikhen khia ding hi, Topa in ci hi,’ ci in,” a ci hi.
verses.34: Topa in Moses kiangah, “A namtui nate, stakte, onikha le galbanum, paknamtui citak tawh a namtui nate (a tamna a kikim ciatin) la inla,
verses.35: paknamtui bawlteʼ hih bangin ci sawhin a nin baang lo, biakna paknamtui bawl in.
verses.36: Nangmah in kim khat a neu mahmah in na satnen dinga, nang tawh ka kituah nading kikhopna buk sunga thuciamna mai ah pawl khat na koih ding hi. Tua pen nangma adingin a siangtho pen hi ding hi.
verses.37: A kigawm pih ngei teng tawh na bawl ding paknamtui pen note adingin na bawl kei ding uh hi. Tua pen note adingin Topaʼ tungah a siangtho hi ding hi.
verses.38: Tua tawh a kibangin paknamtui a bawl mi peuhmah ama miteʼ kiang panin kikhen khia ding hi,” a ci hi.
